abstract: The numerical score rankings to return from the search.
overview:
## Discussion

GameKit ignores the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKLeaderboard/range] property if the leaderboard request initializes using the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKLeaderboard/init(playerIDs:)] method. Otherwise, the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKLeaderboard/range] property filters which scores to return to your game. For example, if you specify a range of `[1,10]`, when the search completes, your game receives the best ten scores. The default range is `[1,25]`.

The minimum index is `1`. The maximum length is `100`.

# range

**Instance Property**

The numerical score rankings to return from the search.

## Declaration

```swift
var range: NSRange { get set }
```

## Discussion

GameKit ignores the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKLeaderboard/range] property if the leaderboard request initializes using the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKLeaderboard/init(playerIDs:)] method. Otherwise, the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKLeaderboard/range] property filters which scores to return to your game. For example, if you specify a range of `[1,10]`, when the search completes, your game receives the best ten scores. The default range is `[1,25]`.

The minimum index is `1`. The maximum length is `100`.

## Deprecated properties

- **category**: The named leaderboard to retrieve information from.
- **identifier**: The named leaderboard to retrieve information from.
- **isLoading**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the leaderboard object is retrieving scores.
- **localPlayerScore**: The score that the local player earns.
- **maxRange**: The size of the leaderboard.
- **playerScope**: A filter that restricts the search to a subset of the players in Game Center.
- **scores**: An array of scores that contains the scores that the search returns.
- **timeScope**: A filter that restricts the search to scores within a specific period of time.
